snippet: The 2010 Corchaug Estate reserve from McCall Wines was the star from a selection of wines produced in East End vineyards.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column highlights seven pinots from Long Island vineyards that pair ideally with locally bred duck (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: The 2010 Corchaug Estate reserve from McCall Wines was the star from a selection of wines produced in East End vineyards.

headline.seo: Pairing Long Island Pinot Noir With Duck
headline.main: Seven Pinots to Pair With Duck
headline.print_headline: Seven Pinots to Pair With Duck
